text:
Hi there, is there any documentation out there for default modules? I’m trying to use the default Image module in my templates so that I can make use of HubSpot’s CDN, however I’m having trouble sizing it well and I can’t figure out what my options are for “size_type”. Here’s the HubL code:
`{% module "techcrunch_logo" overrideable=True, path='@HubSpot/linked_image', img='{"size_type":"exact","src":"<https://link-to-image.com/>","alt":"TechCrunch","width":200,"height":28,"max_width":200,"max_height":28}', label='TechCrunch Logo' %}`
